mapper.select: select idu, username, `password`, email, first_name, last_name, country, `location`, address, `work`, school, website, bio, `date`, facebook, twitter, gplus, image, private_states, suspended, salted, cover, verified, privacy, gender, interests, `online`, `offline`, ip, user_group, notificationl, notificationc, notifications, notificationd, notificationf, notificationg, notificationx, notificationp, email_comment, email_like, email_new_friend, email_group_invite, email_page_invite, sound_new_notification, sound_new_chat, born, lastloginlat, lastloginlong, push from user where idu = #{idu,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select idu, username, `password`, email, first_name, last_name, country, `location`, address, `work`, school, website, bio, `date`, facebook, twitter, gplus, image, private_states, suspended, salted, cover, verified, privacy, gender, interests, `online`, `offline`, ip, user_group, notificationl, notificationc, notifications, notificationd, notificationf, notificationg, notificationx, notificationp, email_comment, email_like, email_new_friend, email_group_invite, email_page_invite, sound_new_notification, sound_new_chat, born, lastloginlat, lastloginlong, push from user where username like CONCAT('%',#{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
